TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件时的插入按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"插入") 在控件内单击时，但之后控件插入记录。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 这使您可以提供的事件处理程序执行自定义的例程，例如每次此事件发生时检查插入操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理程序，可用于确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受 insert 操作的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用属性以确定是否发生任何异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果你需要访问插入的记录的值，请使用属性。If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 默认情况下，控件返回到所指定的模式后插入操作的属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an insert operation. 若要保留控件在插入模式下，设置属性`true`。To keep the control in insert mode, set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象传递给事件处理程序事件，以确定是否在插入操作期间发生了异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that represents the exception raised when the insert operation was performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||对象中包含`e`参数。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 在引发事件时，将主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.

value.span: 受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定的插入操作所影响的行数。Use the property to determine the number of rows affected by the insert operation. 此值通常用于验证已插入相应的行数。This value is commonly used to verify that the appropriate number of rows was inserted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定的插入操作所影响的行数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of rows affected by the insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取插入操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示插入操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定异常 （如果有） 插入操作过程中引发。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且你决定要处理的事件处理程序中的异常，请务必设置属性`true`; 否则为该异常传递到下一个方法调用堆栈上进行处理。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否在插入操作期间引发了一个异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception was raised during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在插入操作期间引发了异常时，则使用属性以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 当此属性设置为`true`，将异常认为是已处理，而不调用堆栈中继续向上传递。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not passed further up the call stack. 如果此属性设置为`false`，异常传递到下一个方法调用堆栈上以进行处理。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInInsertMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作完成后 控件是否仍保持插入模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation.

value.span: 如果在插入操作完成后仍保持插入模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to remain in insert mode after an insert operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件返回到所指定的模式属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property. 使用属性指定是否控件插入操作完成后应保留在插入模式。Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation. 若要保留控制在插入模式下，将此属性设置为`true`。To keep the control in insert mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 当你想要想要仅偶尔重写的默认模式时，应使用此属性。This property should be used when you want to want to override the default mode only occasionally. 如果控件需要保持在插入模式下，默认情况下，设置属性改为。If the control needs to remain in insert mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以保留中插入操作完成之后在插入模式的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to keep the control in insert mode after an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含已插入记录所对应的字段名/值对的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

value.span: ，包含已插入记录的键字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问用于插入的记录的字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录插入的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records. 属性返回的对象实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示插入的记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the inserted record. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问所插入记录的字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the fields of the inserted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]
